data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mansell, Mervyn W. (2013): First records of the antlion genus Solter Navás from southern Africa, with description of a new species (Neuroptera: Myrmeleontidae: Myrmecaelurini). Zootaxa 3731 (3): 381-385, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3731.3.7
